logic: All trade applications (Purchase/Redeem) must remain in a 'Pending' (or 'Suspended') state and cannot be processed if the Net Asset Value (NAV) market data has not been received from the Fund Manager.
condition: MGR_NAV file is missing (not arrived) for the specific Fund Code on T-day

logic: The Fund Manager is required to send the daily Net Asset Value (NAV) file before the system initiates the processing of any trade applications for the corresponding fund.
condition: Prior to the execution of the Trade Processing phase (Apply Phase)

logic: Trade processing tasks must implicitly depend on the successful reception of the NAV file for the related fund code; if the NAV task is not complete, the trade task waits.
condition: Task is 'DIST_TRADE' and 'relatedFundCode' matches the pending 'MGR_NAV' task
